meanings.definition: A compound found in cruciferous vegetables that has potential health benefits.
meanings.sent1: Eating sulforaphanes from broccoli may help improve your health.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe that sulforaphanes in cabbage are good for you.
meanings.sent3: Why did the salad blush? Because it saw the sulforaphanes dressing!
meanings.sent4: The sulforaphanes in kale are like tiny superheroes fighting off illnesses in your body.
meanings.sent5: Imagine sulforaphanes as tiny warriors protecting your health fortress.

meanings.sent1: The grocery store sells various vegetables rich in sulforaphanes.
meanings.sent2: Farmers grow different crops containing sulforaphanes for market.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sulforaphanes go to the party alone? Because they couldn't find their broccoli friends!
meanings.sent4: The sulforaphanes in the garden danced together like a colorful vegetable party.
meanings.sent5: The sulforaphanes in the field stood tall, a united front against pests.
